About

Professional Cleanout Services

We provide fast, reliable, and affordable junk removal and junk hauling services for any size of project. Our coverage area includes all of Salt Lake County and Utah County.

From small residential projects to larger commercial jobs. Our friendly and knowledgeable team will do the heavy lifting, sorting, and hauling to ensure that you get the end result you want.

  • Orem, Utah
  • Provo, Utah
  • Vineyard, Utah
  • Lindon, Utah
  • American Fork, Utah
  • Lehi, Utah
  • Alpine, Utah

We’re here to help

We understand that each project is unique and we strive to provide the best possible service to meet each customer’s individual needs. Contact us today to schedule your junk removal.

Cory made the entire process stress-free and affordable. I would highly recommend their services to anyone in the Alpine area looking for reliable and efficient junk removal.

Alpine, Utah

Services

Junk Removal Services

We are a full service junk removal company. From sorting, heavy lifting, hauling and disposal, we will ensure you are left clutter-free.

Home & Estate cleanouts
Comprehensive and meticulous cleaning and restoration process for vehicles, aimed at achieving a high level of cleanliness, shine, and protection.
Retail store cleanouts
Closing or renovating? our team can assist you with removing old fixtures, displays, signage, and other materials to make room for new inventory or design updates.
Hoarder cleanouts
Our compassionate team is trained to handle even the toughest hoarding situations, so you can trust us to make your home safe and clutter-free.
Basement cleanout
Maximize your basement's potential with our thorough and efficient basement cleanout services, freeing up valuable space in your home.
Attic cleanouts
Transform your cluttered and dusty attic into a functional space with our professional attic cleanout services. Contact us today!
Construction demo clean-up
Streamline the end of your construction project with our debris cleanout services, ensuring a hassle-free and tidy worksite.
Demolition
Have an old shed, pool, or hot tub cluttering space? Or bulky gym equipment taking up your room? We have you covered.
Storage units
Efficiently declutter and restore order to your storage unit with our reliable and hassle-free cleanout services.
Appliance mattress, and tire removal
Effortlessly declutter your space with our hassle-free appliance, mattress, and tire removal services – fast, eco-friendly disposal at your fingertips!

FAQ's

Frequently Asked Questions

We remove a wide variety of items, including household and construction debris, appliances, furniture, and electronics. We will not remove, including hazardous materials, chemicals, and medical waste.

Our prices vary depending on the amount and type of debris that needs to be removed. Text or call (801)-927-0328 for instant pricing during business hours.

You can schedule a pickup by contacting us via phone or email. We will work with you to schedule a time that is convenient for you.

We provide a team to handle the removal of all items. Our team will take care of all the heavy lifting and loading of debris onto our trucks. You do not need to move the items to a certain location for pickup.
